sub_title: Freelancer: Infrastructure & Virtualization Specialist | ★VMware VCIX & vExpert | ★Microsoft MCITP | ★Bachelor of Engineering (ing.)
summary:
𝐈𝐧 𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐭, 𝐰𝐡𝐨 𝐚𝐦 𝐈?
I’m a passionate IT specialist, that loves to write & speak about technology and is also known for the website & channel vSAM.pro. I work as a consultant in the field of IT for Dutch, Belgian and other companies in the EMEA region, and since 2023, also for companies in the APAC region.

𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐞𝐫
I am a driven person that loves to share my knowledge and is known for an energetic & tireless attitude that will get things done. With a wide range of experiences in different industries, cultures and roles in the IT Infrastructure, I am able to learn fast and to adapt quickly in any organization and team. 

𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞										
Broad and in-depth experience in the IT infrastructure, including but not limited to: 
Storage Systems, Servers, Microsoft Systems, Security, Networking, SDN, Operations & Virtualization, with an extensive specialization in the VMware Stack. 

I have led different types of projects including: 
Migrations, Integrations, Brown & Greenfield Deployments, Merge & Transitions, Upgrades & Updates, Scale & Renewal, Audits & Health Checks and IT Modernization.

𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐭𝐥𝐞𝐬
★ Bachelor of Engineering (ing.) 
★ VMware Certified Implementation Expert - Data Center Virtualization (6.x)
★ Microsoft Certified IT Professional - Enterprise Administrator (2013)
 + ★ Microsoft Certified Solution Associate - Windows Server (2016) 
• Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL)

• CloudU: Key Elements of Cloud Computing

𝐇𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐫𝐬 & 𝐀𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐬
★ vExpert, VMware - Selected 4 times (2019, 2020, 2021, 2022)
 + ★ vExpert Sub-programs: Cloud Management (2020 & 2021)
 + ★ vExpert Sub-programs: NSX (2021)
★ Student of Honor, Zuyd University (2014)
★ Top-student, NRC Career Competition - Selected 2 times (2012)
★ Top 10 Dutch Salesman, Chain of Dixons Retail (2009)

𝑪𝒆𝒓𝒕𝒊𝒇𝒊𝒄𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔 (31)

This for my contribution towards the school & study program.

profile_positions.description:
Taking my specialization in Infrastructure & Virtualization to another level, I was a proud member of the ITQ family. 

Founded in 2001, ITQ has always been driven to deliver the most innovative IT solutions and infrastructure to their customers. ITQ has become a fully independent business, which doesn’t sell software or hardware, but instead, purely focus on gaining knowledge and offering the best advice to their clients.
profile_positions.title: Virtualization Consultant
-- ITQ Project: Upgrade of Full Hardware Stack & VMware vSphere (VDI Platform)

profile_positions.description:
With a specialisation in Virtualisation, I was a proud member of the Managed Staffing Team of Cheops. 

Cheops works for Belgian and international companies from various industries, from SMEs to major companies. Cheops is vendor-neutral, and with that able to select the best technology in the interest of their customer, and have solutions that are based on industry standards and proven technology implemented by market leaders in the specific areas. With 250 IT experts Cheops thinks along strategically to make your business more efficient, more productive, more adaptive and, consequently, more competitive.

profile_positions.title: -- Projects & Consultancy Cheops (IT Infrastructure Consultant):

profile_positions.description:
The leading nanoelectronics research center, imec, and digital research and incubation center, iMinds in Ghent, were officially merged together on 22 September 2016.

While officially being merged, the transition between the two totally opposite IT infrastructure was still in progress. As a consultant I was hired to help with the transition, merge, integration and administration of the IT infrastructure of imec Ghent (formerly known as iMinds). Besides that, I've also helped with the setup of the new office in Antwerp (Livinglabs) and partially helped with the administration of the vSphere Environment of Imec (HQ) Leuven. I also led all the IT projects within imec Ghent

Responsible Domains Ghent:
• VMware vSphere 6.x Environment 
• Infra stretched over 2 Datacenters & 3 office locations
• Network administration (HP)
• Storage administration (Dell EqualLogic)
• Fortigate Firewall
• DNS administration
• Backups (Veeam)
• Monitoring (Zabbix)
• Windows & Partially Linux Administration
• Enhancement of Security
• Contact person regarding licenses, contracts & agreements with different parties
profile_positions.title: -- Consultancy Cheops: Integrator & Infrastructure Administrator of imec Ghent

profile_positions.description:
3-it is an IT company that contains a wide diversity of IT specialist and experts, and consist of a strong management team that both has in-depth knowledge as well as long time experience in the wide and diverse field of IT. I am happy that I was part of this great and enthusiastic company, which is full of young energy as well as experienced seniors. 

In the time that I've worked for 3-it, I have been placed on different types of projects for our direct customers. After obtaining my VCP5.5 certificate within the company and gaining more experience with VMware, I worked for Proximus as a VMware Consultant and System Engineer. 

In the mean time, I've also given 2 separate VMware trainings within the company.

profile_positions.title: -- Projects & Consultancy 3-it (IT Consultant):

profile_positions.description:
Within Proximus, I joined a dedicated team for one of Proximus biggest customers. ASTRID is the operator of the national radio communications, paging and dispatching network designed for emergency and security services in Belgium. 

Within in this team, I delivered system continuity and support to all the Provincial CIC's in Belgium, together with the police and medical zones, and worked on several big projects. This includes, but is not limited to:

• Designing, Creating and Implementing several vSphere 5.5 test environments with vSAN 5.5 Storage, and the Migration of the old environment tot the new sites.
• Installation and Configuration of Horizon View 6.0 (Both Clean install as Upgrade)
• Worked on one of the biggest projects of that year, which included the Virtualisation, Centralisation and Migration of Hosts, Servers and Workstations.
• Security Harding of the VMware vSphere environment.
• Deployment & Configuration of VDI Pools

• Installation & Optimisation of Windows Servers and VDI Desktops.
• Complete Staging, Installation and Configuration of several vSphere environments
• Worked with HP Proliant Servers, Cisco UCS and NetApp.
profile_positions.title: -- Consultancy 3-it: VMware & System Engineer @ Outsourcing team A.S.T.R.I.D.

profile_positions.description:
E-Commerce Park is located in Curaçao and was established in 1999, giving follow up to the public-private initiative to make Curaçao one of the E-Commerce centers of the region. E-Commerce Park is a Tier III data center that guarantees its customers a minimum of N+1 redundancy. The facility is currently housing the landing station of Columbus Networks as well the CAR-IX internet exchange and POPs of the majority of the telecom licensees of the Netherlands Antilles. 

During my time at ECP, I lead a research project that would define the usability and difficulty of implementing a "Security Information & Event Management" (SIEM) system to enhance the high Security Standards of ECP. On January 31, 2014 after being judged by four assessors, I graduated with an 8/10 and got my bachelor degree of Applied Science.
profile_positions.title: ★ Graduation Internship (Curaçao): Technical Lead in "SIEM" project

profile_positions.description: Besides working 40 hours on my Graduation Project, I also worked fulltime as a NOC Engineer in a 5 shift team operation (6 days work, 4 days off).
profile_positions.title: NOC Engineer
